description: This file defines the exported API for the Content Filtering Simple Object, including function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the object. It mainly declares interface functions related to the content filtering system.

methods.name: ContFilterCreateSimpleObject
methods.description: Creates a simple content filtering object with specified context handles.

methods.name: ContFilterSsoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Content Filtering SSO object with specified context handles.

methods.name: ContFilterSsoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Content Filtering SSO object.

methods.name: ContFilterSsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Content Filtering SSO.

methods.name: ContFilterSsoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Content Filtering SSO object.
